game.name: Capsulitas
game.shortDescription: A physics-based gacha meets inventory management roguelike. Insert a coin, organize your backpack, and sell for profit! Multiply items with hammers, upgrade your machine, and survive the inflation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A physics-based gacha meets inventory management roguelike. Insert a coin, organize your backpack, and sell for profit! Multiply items with hammers, upgrade your machine, and survive the inflation.
